properties.name: Auburn Castle
properties.info: A keep near the south-west border of Navolin, Auburn Castle is the ancestral home of the halfling Montajay family.

properties.name: Castle Grinsted
properties.info: Castle Grinsted is the home castle and seat of Count Jeskin Sebroksi. It is located along the Sulas river in southern Navolin and is the capital of the County of Szary. The castle is roughly two day's travel from the village of Rythlon.

properties.name: Kaer Soderhan
properties.info: Kaer Soderhan is a castle-town located in the southern Blighted Mire, overlooking the Bay of Claws. The keep was rebuilt on foundation of an ancient, ruined fortress

properties.name: Kaer Valvik
properties.info: Kaer Valvik is a border-keep located at the eastern border of the Archduchy of Zurast, on the edge of the Barrier Coast and Navolin. The castle was constructed to guard the eastern expansion of the archduchy after it claimed the territory during the War of Sellswords.

properties.name: Kaer Kamvik
properties.info: Kaer Kamvik is a castle which guards the northeast border of Lemuria from possible invasion through the Drowned Weald.

properties.name: Kaer Sundsvall
properties.info: Kaer Sundsvall guards the Trädgård Plain from threats from the Vuradel Coast.

properties.name: Kaer Alfjall
properties.info: Kaer Alfjall is the hill fortress located in southern Lemuria, guarding the entrance to Isdrage Bay. The keep is a stronghold and training center for Clan Sjomann.

properties.name: Kaer Undvik
properties.info: Kaer Undvik is a fortress on the edge of the Razark Timberlands which overlooks the western Ursgal Islands.

properties.name: Kaer Skogsvakt
properties.info: Kaer Skogsvakt guards western Lemuria from the threats that reside in the Razark Timberlands. The keep is one of the oldest fortresses in Lemuria.

properties.name: Kaer Lågsten
properties.info: Kaer Lågsten is a large castle in the heart of the Rikedal Lowlands. The castle is an important training complex for Clan Arnbjorg.

properties.name: Kaer Edsken
properties.info: Kaer Edsken is a keep on the northwest border of Lemuria. It guards the roadway between the Korin Gulf and the Torick Peaks.

properties.name: Var Zvolt
properties.info: Var Zvolt guards the southern reaches of Tovanis. Many people claim the keep is haunted by ghosts of the realm's dark past.

properties.name: Var Mezera
properties.info: Var Mezera defends Tovanis from border incursions from Cibrin. The keep has been lost and retaken numerous times by both realms during their contentious history.

properties.name: Var Donin
properties.info: Var Donin is a hill fort in the foothills of the Pillars of Amud. The residents of the surrounding castle-town are mostly human, but a large number of dwarves also call the keep home.

properties.name: Var Valoska
properties.info: This keep guards the northern end of the Retirim river valley from invasion by the denizens of the Desolate Wastes.

properties.name: Var Lozorn
properties.info: Var Lozorn was once a dwarven town in ages past. The keep passed into the hands of the Kingdom of Istagen, and a mighty tower was built over the old fortress.

properties.name: Var Rahonik
properties.info: Var Rahonik is the eastern-most keep of the Realm of Tovanis. During the years of the Kingdom of Istagen, the castle was home to the largest garrison in central Ulfwyst.

properties.name: Kaer Sevhrad
properties.info: Kaer Sevhrad is a newly built castle on the border of Lemuria and Zurast. After the loss of the Lepkar Peninsula, Lemuria had no border keeps to the north, resulting in the construction of this new keep.

properties.name: Castle Westerholt
properties.info: Westerholt is the Navolinian garrison tasked with guarding against incursions from the Desolate Wastes. With the decline of threats from the west, the keep has fallen into disrepair.

properties.name: Castle Zagórz
properties.info: Castle Zagórz is a border-castle located north western Kelishan Highlands. It was once the keep of Zagórz dynasty of Malstein.

properties.name: Castle Wittmund
properties.info: Castle Wittmund is a castle in the foothills of the Jordonis Mountains, guarding against aggression from the creatures that live in the Gorcien Forests, or those that might descend from the mountains to the east.

properties.name: Castle Kollrung
properties.info: Castle Kollrung sits in the heartland of the Kingdom of Navolin. At one time it marked the southern border of the kingdom before the wars of expansion that saw Navolin conquer the Kelishan Highlands.

properties.name: Castle Lęczyca
properties.info: Castle Lęczyca is an abandoned fortress in the Czinlas Weald of the Gorcien Forests. Peasants who live in other nearby villages say the castle has been abandoned for generations and claim it is haunted. None dare to venture near this dark place.

properties.name: Castle Roznów
properties.info: Castle Roznów is an abandoned castle located on the edge of the Shambling Woods in north central Navolin. It was last occupied by Count Mathias Tykoncin, who ruled the area until 2C 2231, when the castle was sacked during the War of Five Crowns.

properties.name: Castle Senmyr
properties.info: Castle Senmyr was one of the largest fortresses in Azond before its conquest by the Kingdom of Navolin. Now it serves as a garrison for the Navolinian Hussars in the region.

properties.name: Castle Adendorf
properties.info: Though still a functional keep, Castle Adendorf now serves more as a palacial retreat for members of the royal Czak family.

properties.name: Castle Bricza
properties.info: Castle Bricza guards the eastern border between Navolin and the Barrier Coast. The castle was almost completely destroyed several centuries ago by Kerathax, the Lord of Ash.

properties.name: Castle Tykocin
properties.info: Castle Tykocin overlooks the western roads of the Kingdom of Navolin leading into the Damali Steppe.

properties.name: Castle Zolta
properties.info: Castle Zolta is a castle which was destroyed during the Navolinian conquest of Azond. After its destruction, the region's administration was put directly in the hands of the Rada of Zelmar.

properties.name: Castle Mignollard
properties.info: Castle Mignollard is the eastern-most fortification of the Kaeldrin Sanctum. The fortress guards the roadway south into the Damali Steppe.

properties.name: Castle Thun
properties.info: A coastal fortress overlooking the Bay of Sathir, Castle Thun stands atop a naturally jetty. Due to this imposing location and the ability to resupply the fortress from the sea, the castle has never been breached the few times it has been put under siege.

properties.name: Castle Romont
properties.info: Castle Romont guards the western edge of the Sullen Fen. The castle was originally a tower constructed by an archmage long ago, but after her death the tower was fortified and turned into a proper defensive structure.

properties.name: Castle Erstfeld
properties.info: Guarding the southwest region of the Kaeldrin Sanctum, Castle Erstfeld is an expansive fortress designed to hold out against attacks from both the ground and sky. It is rumored the castle could withstand a siege for over 2 years without need for reinforcements.

properties.name: Castle Ferden
properties.info: Built atop one of the few rocky hills in the Vorssav Marshlands, Castle Ferden provides a safe haven should hostile forces invade Kaeldrin from the northwest.

properties.name: Castle Oltelmar
properties.info: Castle Oltelmar is a castle-town located centrally in the Zorebrak Peninsula. Though a functional keep, the primary purpose of the complex is to train battle-mages for the Kaeldrin military.
